DOC.brief_summary: The overall clinical trial objective gain information Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) 400 µg dose strength INFS use Population PK ( PopPK ) . In total , 20 healthy male female subject plan randomize trial . Subjects randomize one two treatment sequence treat 3 different dosage ( either 200 µg/dose INFS , 400 µg/dose 400 µg two dos administer 10 minute apart ) two day . Subjects hospitalize period total 5 day , safety assessment pharmacokinetic sampling conduct .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigate Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) Single Doses 200 µg , 400 µg 2 x 400 µg Intranasal Fentanyl Spray ( INFS ) Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria : Healthy male female Caucasian Black subject 18 55 year body mass index 1828 kg/m2 minimum weight 50 kg .
